DOC.brief_summary: Certain lung disease medications can influence diagnostic tests and research investigations. This study will investigate how long ipratropium bromide must be withheld before a methacholine challenge test can be conducted. This information will be useful for validating current guidelines.
DOC.brief_title: Duration of Protective Effect From Inhaled Ipratropium Bromide on Methacholine Airway Hyperresponsiveness
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of asthma; stable and controlled FEV1 greater than or equal to 65% predicted Concomitant lung disease other than asthma
